name: MDLMaterialPropertyType
desc: Options for the data type of a material property, used by the type property.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The material property’s value has not been initialized.

items.name: case string
items.desc: The material’s value is a string.

items.name: case URL
items.desc: The material property’s value is a URL—typically, a URL referencing a texture image.

items.name: case texture
items.desc: The material property’s value is a MDLTextureSampler object that provides both a texture image and texture rendering parameters.

items.name: case color
items.desc: The material property’s value is a uniform color.

items.name: case float
items.desc: The material property’s value is a floating-point scalar.

items.name: case float2
items.desc: The material property’s value is a 2-component floating-point vector.

items.name: case float3
items.desc: The material property’s value is a 3-component floating-point vector.

items.name: case float4
items.desc: The material property’s value is a 4-component floating-point vector.

items.name: case matrix44
items.desc: The material property’s value is a 4 x 4 floating-point matrix.
